person_say: I've been feeling a bit burnt out with studying lately. How can I reignite my interest?
animal_say: Bzz! You have a Fear of Failure. Focus on enjoying the process, not the outcome!

person_say: That's a really good point! I need to remind myself that creating art is about expressing myself and enjoying the process, rather than just focusing on the final result. Maybe I can set aside some time just to doodle or paint without pressure.
animal_say: Buzz! Embrace the joy of creativity! Focus on fun, not perfection. Happy creating!

person_say: Thanks! I'll definitely embrace the joy of creativity and focus on having fun. Happy creating to you too!
animal_say: Buzz buzz! I'm thrilled to hear that! Enjoy your artistic journey!
